hero.headline: How to Create YouTube Shorts
hero.subheadline: Master short-form video. Reach new audiences through the Shorts feed.

sections.content: YouTube Shorts are vertical videos under 60 seconds, competing directly with TikTok and Instagram Reels. They appear in a dedicated feed with massive reach potential. The format requires different thinking than long-form—hook fast, deliver value quickly, and optimize for vertical viewing.

faq.question: Best length for Shorts?
faq.answer: 15-30 seconds often performs best. Long enough for value, short enough for replay. Under 60 is requirement. Test different lengths for your content.

faq.question: Do I need #Shorts in title?
faq.answer: Helps with discovery but not strictly required. YouTube recognizes vertical under-60s format. Including it doesn't hurt and may help.

faq.question: Can I repurpose TikToks?
faq.answer: Yes—but remove TikTok watermark. YouTube may deprioritize watermarked content. Re-export from original or use tools to remove.

faq.question: How often should I post Shorts?
faq.answer: Daily or several times weekly for best results. Consistency matters for algorithm. Quality still important—don't sacrifice for quantity.
